Articles.Content:
hey guys

every time i want to eva i lose my kerbal and he became a unknown object i have the following mods running:

bobcats american pack

firespitter

romfrer

KAS

jsi

kerbaljointreinforcment

fusetek/kerbalteck

lifesupport

magic smoke

000_toolbar

can somebody tell me whats wrong?
Scott manley had this problem and he said it was from not updating to the latest kerbal joint reinfocement.
oww thanx i wil change that one than

If that doesn't fix your problem, you can also check the thread below. It mostly has to do with kerbals showing up as "debris" or a "base" but it might be related. It sometimes happens when they end up in a ragdoll state.

Also, make sure you have the most recent KSP version (0.23.5.464).

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA
